name: Unidentified Frog Objects
description:
How to play: Controls:

    Controller (Recommended):

  •         Right Trigger - Accelerate
  •         Left Trigger - Decelerate
  •         Right Bumper - Shoot
  •         Right Stick - Adjust Pitch/Yaw
  •         Left Stick - Adjust Roll
  •         Start - Return to main menu
  •         D-Pad - Navigate menu
  •         A - Select

    Keyboard/Mouse:

  •         W - Accelerate
  •         Shift - Decelerate
  •         Left Mouse Button - Shoot/select
  •         Mouse Motion - Adjust Pitch/Yaw
  •         A/Q - Roll Left
  •         D/E - Roll Right
  •         Escape - Return to main menu
Objective:
  •     Eliminate the invading frog force!
  •     Small UFO = 3 points
  •     Large UFO = 50 points
  •     Plays like Luftrausers, but in 3D.
Notes:
  •     If you start the game before the terrain is generated you can fall beneath the world. Returning to the main menu solves this.
  •     Sometimes enemies explode for no apparent reason. This is because their engines are faulty and not because it's a bug I don't know how to fix.
  •     Sometimes the big UFOs spawn inside other big UFOs. This is not intended. This might cause the game to crash (or just severely slow down) if one of them explodes.
  •     I have no idea how good your computer needs to be to run this game. It is not optimized in the slightest.
  • Might crash when you lose...
